programme.desc: Max Fried tries to bounce back as his Yankees host the Guardians. Fried (7-1, 1.92 ERA, 0.97 WHIP) comes off an 8-5 loss at Dodger Stadium in which he yielded six runs. The ace left-hander had permitted 10 earned runs in his previous 11 starts.

programme.title: New York Yankees Postgame
programme.desc: Recap and highlights of the Yankees game.
